title: The Cat and the fiddler
creator_credit: Jane Startz, Jeffrey Hayes, ACI Films and Thomas Sand Enterprises
brief_description: Tells the story of a travelling fiddler and his dancing cat whose performances earns a living for both of them. The king tries to buy the cat, however it will only dance for the fiddler. He plays but the court and the king cannot stop dancing. Based on the book by Jacky Jeter, illustrated by Lionel kalish. The original illustrations from the book are used in the film. Suitable for primary school level.
